event: Unification of Upper and Lower Egypt by King Narmer/Menes
commit_message: Initial commit: Formation of unified Egyptian state

event: Old Kingdom period - Age of the Pyramids
Construction of the Great Pyramid of Giza under Pharaoh Khufu
commit_message: Build: Completed Great Pyramid of Giza

event: Middle Kingdom period - Classical period of Egyptian civilization
New Kingdom period - Egyptian Empire at its height
commit_message: Major update: Expansion to Egyptian Empire

event: Reign of Akhenaten - Introduction of Atenism, first known monotheistic religion
commit_message: Breaking change: Religious revolution with Atenism

event: Battle of Kadesh against the Hittites
commit_message: Event: Major military conflict with Hittites

event: Late Period - Decline and foreign invasions
commit_message: Warning: Period of decline and instability
Fork: Hellenistic influence begins with Alexander

event: Ptolemaic Period - Hellenistic Egypt under Ptolemaic dynasty
Death of Cleopatra VII, Egypt becomes a Roman province
commit_message: End of life: Egypt conquered by Rome, ancient period ends
